displacementae.grouprepr.block_lookup_representation module¶

class displacementae.grouprepr.block_lookup_representation.BlockLookupRepresentation(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: GroupRepresentation

This subclass of group representations is a direct product of subrepresentations, as such it maps transitions to block diagonal matrices.

forward(a: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Gets the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

act(a: torch.Tensor, z: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Acts on an input representation vector :arg:`z` through matrix product with the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

Args:
a, torch.Tensor: Batch of transitions.

shape: [batch_size,n_action]

z, torch.Tensor: Batch of representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr]

Returns:
torch.Tensor: Transformed representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr_units]

normalize_vector(z: torch.Tensor)[source]¶

displacementae.grouprepr.group_representation module¶

class displacementae.grouprepr.group_representation.GroupRepresentation(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: Module

An interface for group representation classes.

Group representations are maps from the abstract action group to invertible matrices through the :method:`forward` method. Group representations also define a linear action of the abstract group on the representation space of observations, as such the group representation transforms input representation vectors through the matrix product with the representation of a given action, through the :method:`act` method.

forward(a: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Gets the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

act(a: torch.Tensor, z: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Acts on an input representation vector :arg:`z` through matrix product with the representation matrix of input transition :arg:`a`.

Args:
a, torch.Tensor: Batch of transitions.

shape: [batch_size,n_action]

z, torch.Tensor: Batch of representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr]

Returns:
torch.Tensor: Transformed representation vectors.

shape: [batch_size,n_repr_units]

get_example_repr(a: Optional[torch.Tensor] = None) → ndarray[source]¶
representation_loss(*args)[source]¶
end_iteration()[source]¶
normalize_vector(z: torch.Tensor)[source]¶

displacementae.grouprepr.trivial_representation module¶

class displacementae.grouprepr.trivial_representation.TrivialRepresentation(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: GroupRepresentation

A Trivial Representation.

Maps all group elements to identity transformation.

forward(a: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Returns identity representation for any action.

act(a: torch.Tensor, z: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Acts trivially on input z.

displacementae.grouprepr.unstructured_representation module¶

class displacementae.grouprepr.unstructured_representation.UnstructuredRepresentation(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]¶

Bases: GroupRepresentation

Class for unstructured latent transformation.

Instead of transforming latent by group actions, this representation simply map [latent, action] to the next latent through an MLP
